content.headline: The team
content.intro1: Who is part of your organization? Add or remove additional team members here.
content.intro2: Team members are displayed on the organization's detail page. They cannot edit the organization.

add.headline: Add a team member
add.intro: Add an existing profile to your organization here.
add.label: Name or email

invites.headline: Invitations
invites.intro: Here you can see all the invitations you have already sent.

current.headline: Current team members
current.intro: Here you can see all the team members at a glance.
